|brand = AzureWave |model = AW-GE112H |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = (half)
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 002c |subvendor_id = 1a3b |subdevice_id = 1112 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PPD-AR5B95 |icid = 4104A-AR5B95 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:25:D3, 48:5D:60
|chip1 = Atheros;AR2427; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna2 = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/12/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The 168c:002c PCI ID is the AR2427 ID. It would appear that the AR2427 is a software disabled or specially HT bonded out version of the AR9285.
This device is the wireless module for the.. *ASUS EEE PC 1001P - FCC ID: MSQE05NE785, IC ID: 3568A-E05NE785, ASUS P/N: 04G033054081
Output of '''sudo lspci -vvnnq -d 168c:002c''' [http://pastebin.com/JnC21rvx here], or [https://cloud.openmailbox.org/public.php?service=files&t=8e1962665b2ea4377a517f4bb60e9221&download here].
==Links of Interest== *[https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+question/109155 ASUS EEE PC 900HA] *[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=8700392 Averatec D1130]
